member.name: DWRITE_AUTOMATIC_FONT_AXES
member.summary: Defines constants that specifies axes that can be applied automatically in layout during font selection. Values can be bitwise OR'd together.

member.name: DWRITE_AUTOMATIC_FONT_AXES.DWRITE_AUTOMATIC_FONT_AXES_NONE
member.summary: Specifies that no axes are automatically applied.

member.name: DWRITE_AUTOMATIC_FONT_AXES.DWRITE_AUTOMATIC_FONT_AXES_OPTICAL_SIZE
member.summary: Specifies that—when no value is specified via —an appropriate optical value should be automatically chosen based on the font size (via ). You can still apply the 'opsz' value over text ranges via , which take priority.
